PointCloudReduce & SubsetPointCloud

Contents

  • 1.1. ReducePointCloud
  • 1.2. Input
  • 1.3. Output
  • 1.4. SubsetPointCloud
  • 1.5. Input

1. PointCloudReduce & SubsetPointCloud#

1.1. ReducePointCloud#

Definition

Reduces the number of points in a Point Cloud by a given fraction.

1.2. Input#

Name

Description

Type

Point Cloud

Point Cloud to Reduce

Point Cloud

Fraction

Fraction of Points to remain

Number

1.3. Output#

Name

Description

Type

Point Cloud

Reduced Point Cloud

Point Cloud

1.4. SubsetPointCloud#

Definition

Sections a Point Cloud by a selection box volume.

1.5. Input#

Name

Description

Type

Point Cloud

Point Cloud to Reduce

Point Cloud

Selection box

Volume you want to keep

Box

1.6. Output#

Name

Description

Type

Point Cloud

Selection of Point Cloud

Point Cloud

previous
